plot: The abrupt capital cop on a nickname "Wild" goes to «the compelled reference» in provincial small town. He is assured that it is waited by silent quiet work. He is mistaken ... strongly is mistaken.
plot_en: The abrupt capital cop on a nickname "Wild" goes to «the compelled reference» in provincial small town. He is assured that it is waited by silent quiet work. He is mistaken ... strongly is mistaken.
plot_es: The abrupt capital cop on a nickname "Wild" goes to «the compelled reference» in provincial small town. He is assured that it is waited by silent quiet work. He is mistaken ... strongly is mistaken.
title: Dikiy
